    Subclasses of Reward in RewardsAndPunishments
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BonusReward
    The bonus rewards are not necessary for fishing the game, but contain a higher reward compared to the regular rewards and collecting them improves the final score of the player.
    class 
    PunishmentRoadBlock
    Creates Punishment object to decrease player's score
    class 
    RegularReward
